metadata.title: CVE-2023-33466 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Orthanc before 1.12.0 allows authenticated users with access to the Orthanc API to overwrite arbitrary files on the file system, and in specific deployment scenarios allows the attacker to overwrite the configuration, which can be exploited to trigger Remote Code Execution (RCE).

criterions.comment: orthanc package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
